H0.text: Transporting electrical energy is what AC is better than DC for.

H1.text: Cooking electrical energy is what AC is better than DC for doing.

H2.text: Storing electrical energy is better performed by AC than by DC.

H3.text: Stopping electrical ebergy is what Ac is better than dc for.

A4.text: Electrical energy is distributed as alternating current because AC voltage may be increased or decreased with a transformer.

A5.text: The development of the alternating current transformer allowed generation and consumption at low voltages and transmission, over great distances, at high voltage, with savings in the cost of conductors and energy losses.
